cyclone.name: BILL
cyclone.current_location: about 160 mi ESE of Port O'Connor, TX and 155 mi SSE of Galveston, TX
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the central Texas coast, then inland across south-central Texas and toward Oklahoma
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast (roughly between Port O'Connor and Galveston)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None for Indiana; tropical storm watch/watch area not issued. (Texas coast only).
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Baffin Bay to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast and adjacent western Louisiana shoreline
